typeDescription.name: MyAnnotation
typeDescription.description: This is a super class for all the defined annotations. It will contain: ->ComponentID: The name of the component that produced it. ->Confidence: A float value in (0,1) which shows the confidence of ComponentID in the annotation.

featureDescription.name: ComponentID
featureDescription.description: Name of the Annotator that produced this annotation.

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of the annotator in producing this annotation.

typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: Inherited from MyAnnotation. Members: ->QuestionID: string which uniquely identifies a question. For eg., the questions can have IDs like 'Q1', 'Q2' .. etc. This ID will be sufficient to distinguish it from an answer as well

featureDescription.name: QuestionID
featureDescription.description: A string that uniquely charachterizes this question.

typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: Inherited from MyAnnotation. Members: AnswerID: string that uniquely this answer. IsCorrect: boolean which says if the answer if a correct answer to the question. QuestionID: the question to which this answer is a candidate answer to.

featureDescription.name: AnswerID
featureDescription.description: Will have values like 'A1', 'A2'.. and will be enough to distinguish this from other questions as well.

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: Says if the answer is the answer to this question.

featureDescription.name: QuestionID
featureDescription.description: The question to which this answer is a candidate answer to.

typeDescription.name: Token
typeDescription.description:
Inherited from MyAnnotation. Members: ->SentenceID: The QuestionID or AnswerID to which this token belongs. ->TokenID: The sequence number of the token within the SentenceID. Useful when adjaceny information is requried while calculating NGrams.
Combination of SentenceID and TokenID uniquely charachterizes the Token

featureDescription.name: SentenceID
featureDescription.description: AnswerID or QuestionID to which this token belongs.

featureDescription.name: TokenID
featureDescription.description: The sequence number of the token within that SentenceID

typeDescription.name: NGram
typeDescription.description: Inherited from MyAnnotation. Members: ->SentenceID: The sentence (QuestionID or AnswerID) to which this NGram belongs.

featureDescription.name: SentenceID
featureDescription.description: The QuestionID or AnswerID that this NGram belongs.

typeDescription.name: AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: Inherited from MyAnnotation. Members: ->AnswerID: The answer to which this score is. ->Score: The score for the overlap.

featureDescription.name: AnswerID
featureDescription.description: The ID to the answer for which this score is.

featureDescription.name: Score
featureDescription.description: The score assigned by the NGram overlapper
